thread.title: Grammys 2017: Chrissy Teigen’s New Short Bob Is a Winning Red Carpet Reveal
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017: Chrissy Teigen’s New Short Bob Is a Winning Red Carpet Reveal

title: Grammys 2017: Chrissy Teigen’s New Short Bob Is a Winning Red Carpet Reveal
text: Chrissy Teigen Debuts a New Shoulder-Grazing Cut on the Grammys Red Carpet February 13, 2017 1:50 AM by Calin Van Paris Photo: Getty Images It seems that this is the week of the devil-may-care chop. Less than 12 hours after Kylie Jenner debuted her she’s-with-the-band take on abbreviated lengths at Alexander Wang’s Fall 2017 fashion show in New York, Chrissy Teigen stepped out at the Grammys in Los Angeles to shake out her own textured, slightly dampened, shoulder-grazing style, which she paired with a deep side part and drop earrings. Though the model and new mom—who recently shot her first Sports Illustrated issue since giving birth to daughter Luna last April—has been a champion of extreme waist-grazing hair in recent years, her sun-kissed brunette style looked just as memorable cut short. An easy mom makeover that still packs plenty of bombshell attitude? Consider it the next big red-carpet signature.
